text: Hello, I hope someone can help me to fix an error I'm getting while trying to start Jupyter Notebook. It's not the first time I'm using Jupyter on that system but it is the fırst time I got an error like that. It says that it is unable to precompile IJulia package, while Julia REPL (outside Jupyter) is precompiling it properly whenever I want it to. In case of Jupyter, it gives me a LoadError. Also it says that it has a problem with ZMQ package too, while Julia REPL doesn't output a thing when I run Pkg.build("ZMQ") - it's just giving a blank line and then it is ready for the next command. Can someone help?

elements.text: Hello, I hope someone can help me to fix an error I'm getting while trying to start Jupyter Notebook. It's not the first time I'm using Jupyter on that system but it is the fırst time I got an error like that. It says that it is unable to precompile IJulia package, while Julia REPL (outside Jupyter) is precompiling it properly whenever I want it to. In case of Jupyter, it gives me a LoadError. Also it says that it has a problem with ZMQ package too, while Julia REPL doesn't output a thing when I run Pkg.build("ZMQ") - it's just giving a blank line and then it is ready for the next command. Can someone help?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
`] build IJulia` helps?
Did it just now on Julia REPL. Jupyter still reacts with LoadError.

elements.text: Did it just now on Julia REPL. Jupyter still reacts with LoadError.

text: what do you mean by reacts with loaderror

elements.text: what do you mean by reacts with loaderror

text: after doing `build` in REPL, you do `using IJulia; notebook()` right?
I did that. The process failed

elements.text: I did that. The process failed

text: Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/55098| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
what error does `notebook()` return?
Hey <@U011FCAH30S>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!
